original_title: Nostalgic Repetitions: Alson's Garden, Part One
overview: A study of atmospheric modulations, shifting colors and textures in a meditative sequence of images. The rhythms and tonal impressions of details flow between spaces and offer a kind of complexity and contrast to a perceived sense of time. From slow to fast, the sequence merges ideas of place and identity with time and introspection. In this piece, I explore the flora of Grand Cayman in July.
title: Nostalgic Repetitions: Alson's Garden, Part One
